home_page.hero-sec1: A new transformation in laboratories and health services Based on strategic technology in Raymand Holding
home_page.hero-sec2: Raymand Group was founded with the aim of creating an integrated and technology-driven ecosystem in the supply chain, management, and service delivery. At Raymand Group, we strive to bring about a transformation in the current standards of health and laboratory services in the country through a systematic, scientific, and value-oriented approach. By leveraging advanced technologies and modern management strategies, we aim to develop a localized model of the world's best practices in laboratory service management, specialized equipment supply chains, and health management in Iran.

discover.discover-intro: Raymand Group consists of three companies, each driven by the core motivation to transform the conventional systems in their respective fields. By relying on innovative methods and modern technologies, they aim to find solutions to the existing challenges in the country’s laboratories (both industrial and clinical) and health sector.
discover.raymand1-des1: Supply, import, and production of laboratory equipment and consumables based on GPO principles and value chain
discover.raymand1-des2: The supply chain and import arm for specialized equipment from global brands
discover.raymand1-des3: By utilizing the GPO model, this company enables cost reduction and efficiency improvement in the supply chain for laboratory centers across the country — including industrial, research, and clinical labs.
discover.raymand2-des1: Smart management and implementation of quality assurance systems for specialized, research, and clinical laboratories
discover.raymand2-des2: Implementation and auditing of international standards such as GPI, ISO 17025, and ISO 15189
discover.raymand2-des3: Designing the process structure of laboratories, developing SOPs, and training human resources
discover.raymand2-des4: Consulting on the purchase, installation, calibration, and validation of equipment
discover.raymand2-des5: Management of resources, including human resources, consumables, and capacity planning for laboratory service production
discover.raymand2-des6: Enhancing productivity, accuracy, and effectiveness in laboratory performance
discover.raymand2-des7: Sales of laboratory services and provision of laboratory services Offering research services
discover.raymand3-des1: Smart management of health services based on new technologies
discover.raymand3-des3: Providing smart solutions for all health units
discover.raymand3-des4: Designing operational models and organizational structures
discover.raymand3-des5: Virtual hospital and innovative transformations in pre-hospital, in-hospital, and post-hospital services
